scenario_text.value: So this is where you went, Ryo?
Since when are we on a first-name basis?
Now, now... Let’s all get along, shall we?

Play nice, and I bet Kunemon will make
a great partner for you.
Kewww...
Psssh, yeah right...

So, um... With all due respect, Ryo, are
you...trembling?

Shut up! It’s weird when you get polite like
that all of a sudden.

You’re just making fun of me, like that
Minoru.
So say whatever you want, see if I care...
Oh yeah, weren’t you with Minoru?

Yeah, up until a second ago.
Hmph, I bet he ditched me...!
Kewww...
(Ryo looks so stressed out. What can I do?)
Raise his spirits.
Focus on Aoi.

C’mon man, don’t be like that.
Here, let’s all go back together.
Safe and sound, you know?

Stop spouting the obvious. I bet you’re
scared out of your mind!

We’re gonna keep looking around. You gonna be
okay here?

You know it! It’s way safer to stay here than
wander around like a jerk.
Kew, kew!

Kunemon says, “I’ll protect him if anything
happens!”
You can understand it?
Uh, kinda?
Kewkew!
I see, then it’s all good, I guess.
Give a shout if anything happens, okay?

Pshhh, please.
Like I’d need anything from you.
Kewww...?
